common.downloadModelFirst: Please download model in Settings first
common.pathTooLong: Path too long ({{length}}/{{max}} characters), please choose a shorter path or rename the file
common.pathTooLongSeparate: Path too long ({{length}}/{{max}} characters), generated filenames may exceed system limits, please choose a shorter path or rename the file
common.fileNameTooLong: Filename is long ({{length}} characters), export may fail due to path length, consider renaming before import

dialog.deleteWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
dialog.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? It cannot be recovered.
dialog.deleteAllWarning: Warning: This will delete all projects and their associated data. This cannot be undone!
dialog.deleteAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all {{count}} projects?

toast.noVideoInFolder: No video files in this folder
toast.longFileNameDesc: These projects may fail to export due to path length. Consider renaming before import
toast.sourceNotExistDesc: The source video file has been deleted or moved and cannot be edited

library.title: Music Library
library.subtitle: Manage music fingerprint library, {{count}} tracks total
library.emptySubtitle: Import music to create fingerprint library

dialog.deleteWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
dialog.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this music? It cannot be recovered.
dialog.deleteAllWarning: Warning: This will delete all music fingerprint data. This cannot be undone!
dialog.deleteAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all {{count}} music fingerprints?

toast.deleteAllFailed: Failed to delete all music fingerprints

editor.selectProject: Please select or create a project from the project list

timeline.markStartTime: Mark current playback position as start time
timeline.markEndTime: Mark current playback position as end time

dialog.mergedDesc: Combine all segments into one video file
dialog.separateDesc: Export each segment as a separate file
dialog.exportHintMerged: Merge {{count}} segments into one file. Lossless cut preferred, auto re-encode if needed.
dialog.exportHintSeparate: Export {{count}} segments as separate files. Lossless cut preferred, auto re-encode if needed.
dialog.forceReencodeDesc: Precisely cut segment boundaries. Slower but more accurate output.
dialog.reencodeHint: {{count}} short gap(s) detected. Lossless mode may include gap content. Consider enabling re-encode.

toast.downloadModelFirst: Please download at least one separation model in Settings
toast.importMusicFirst: Please import music to the library first
toast.videoDurationShortDesc: Video duration ({{duration}}s) is less than minimum matching duration ({{minDuration}}s). Adjust "Matching Window Size" in Settings
toast.sourceNotExistDesc: The source video file has been deleted or moved and cannot be edited
toast.previewCompleteDesc: Video can now be played normally
toast.previewFailedDesc: Video may not play properly, but analysis and export still work
toast.detectionModelNotFound: Detection model not found, please download it first

progress.generatingPreview: Generating preview video (format not supported for direct playback)...
progress.separationQueued: Waiting for other project to finish vocal separation...
progress.detectionQueued: Waiting for other detection task to finish...

mdxInstHq3.description: Fast and high quality, suitable for most scenarios

systemInfo.title: System Information
systemInfo.onnxGpuAvailable: ONNX models can use GPU acceleration
systemInfo.onnxGpuUnavailable: No GPU acceleration detected, will use CPU processing

matching.title: Matching Settings
matching.minConfidenceDesc: Matching similarity threshold, below this value won't be recognized as a match (0.0-1.0)
matching.minSegmentDurationDesc: Minimum duration for matched segments, shorter segments will be ignored
matching.windowSizeDesc: Audio length for each analysis, video duration must be greater than this value
matching.hopSizeDesc: Distance the window moves each time, smaller values give higher precision but slower speed
matching.maxGapDurationDesc: Gaps exceeding this value in the same song will be split into separate segments

detection.title: Person Detection Settings
detection.confidenceThresholdDesc: Detection confidence threshold, below this value won't be recognized as a person (0.1-1.0)
detection.frameIntervalDesc: Detect every N frames, smaller values give higher precision but slower speed (1-30)
detection.minSegmentDurationDesc: Minimum duration for detected segments, shorter segments will be ignored
detection.maxGapDurationDesc: Adjacent detection segments with gaps smaller than this value will be merged

log.title: Log Settings
log.hint: Changing log level requires app restart. Log files are saved in the logs folder of the data directory.

data.title: Data Management
data.hint: The following operations cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.

dialog.resetDbWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
dialog.resetDbDesc: Resetting the database will clear all of the following data:
dialog.resetDbItem1: All projects and their segment information
dialog.resetDbItem2: All music and fingerprint data in the library
dialog.resetDbConfirm: Are you sure you want to continue?
dialog.resetConfigDesc: Resetting configuration will restore all settings to default values, including:

toast.dbResetDesc: All projects and music library data cleared
toast.configResetDesc: All settings restored to default values

musicSelector.title: Select Matching Music
musicSelector.useFullLibrary: When no music is selected, the full library will be used for matching
musicSelector.importFirst: Please import music in the Library page first
